meanings.definition: Administers the Christian rite of baptism to
meanings.sent1: The priest baptizes the baby in the church.
meanings.sent2: She baptizes new members every Sunday at the service.
meanings.sent3: The duck thought it could baptize the fish in the pond.
meanings.sent4: The rain baptizes the earth, bringing new life to the plants.
meanings.sent5: The sun baptizes the world in its warm light each morning.

meanings.definition: Initiates or welcomes someone into a new experience or situation
meanings.sent1: The mentor baptizes the intern into the world of business.
meanings.sent2: He baptizes his students into the art of storytelling.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to baptize the new kitten into the ways of the house.
meanings.sent4: The first snowfall baptizes the town into the winter season.
meanings.sent5: The applause baptizes the actor into the world of fame.
